capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's still teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts and looking as fierce as ever.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the designation of mcgonagall?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Minerva McGonagall is doing a fantastic job as the Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's been an incredible leader and mentor to our students, especially the witches and wizards in her Transfiguration class. I've seen firsthand how dedicated she is to helping each student reach their full potential, and it's truly inspiring to be around someone who cares so deeply about education and character development.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of the vice president of hogvy before, but i'm so excited to learn more about them!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's always been very fair and just in her decisions, and I have no doubt she'll do a fantastic job in that role.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does mcgonagall have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is such a sweet and gentle soul. I just love her playful personality and the way she always seems to convey a positive message. She's really got a way of brightening up anyone's day, you know?
